Janesville.Harmony, Rock County, Wisconsin:
Harmony is a town in Rock County, Wisconsin, United States. The population was 2,351 at the 2000 census.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, the town has a total area of 24.0 square miles (62.2 km²), of which, 24.0 square miles (62.0 km²) of it is land and 0.1 square miles (0.1 km²) of it (0.21%) is water.
